EmailTemplate.subject: Work full time on NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Work for The Challenge!
Many thanks for all your work with NCS with The Challenge last summer. We are currently recruiting for a variety of new roles to work in our two London offices.
You may in particular be interested in our Assistant Programme Manager roles in London, for which the deadline is Friday 14th February.
You can find all opportunities and role descriptions at www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles.
Best wishes,
Staffing Team NCS with The Challenge
